result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

w/Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief

Clerk Cheree
Cases 14CF1013, 14CM2176, 15CM401 called: 10:04am
State appears by ADA M.Puerner.  Def appears in person/in custody and with Atty John Wallace.  
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed.  VRCW

State moves to:
14CF1013 - Ct. 1 (Substantial Battery/DA/DA Repeater/Repeater)>>D&RI
14CF1013 - Ct. 3 (CDTP/DA/Repeater/DA Repeater)>>D&RI
15CM402>>D&RI
COURT GRANTS ABOVE

PLEA:
14CF1013 - Ct. 2 (DC/Repeater/DA Repeater/DA)>>NO CONTEST
14CF1013 - Ct. 4 (DC/Repeater/DA Repeater/DA)>>NO CONTEST
14CM2176 - Ct. 1 (Obstructing/Repeater)>>NO CONTEST


COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  

COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.
Defendant makes statement.

COURT ORDERS: 
14CF1013>> 3 years prison TOTAL on each count>> 1 year incarceration and 2 years ES on each count concurrent to each other, to 14CM2176 and to all other sentences defendant now serving.
14CM2176>> 2 years prison TOTAL>> 1 year incarceration and 1 year ES, concurrent to all other sentences.
CONDITIONS: Defendant to sucessfully SAFE program, Any assessment/treatment/counseling as deemed appropriate by PO; N/C w/ victim A.N.; CC including DNA surcharge on each count

Defendant DOES qualify for CIP and SAP on all counts.
Parties state agreement that there is no credit in event of revocation.
COURT remands defendant to sheriffs deptartment for transport to WI State prison System.

Adj: 10:28am
